link.title: Vale School District

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: On April 8, 2020, Oregon Governor Kate Brown announced that all in-person instruction was suspended for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Vale School District is committed to meeting the needs of our students and families during these challenging times. Information regarding Distance Learning for All and continued meal service can be found under COVID-19 Info.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Vale School District is located in rural Eastern Oregon along the historic Oregon Trail. Vale School District serves approximately 940 students in grades K-12. Vale schools are an integral part of the communities they serve, and staff strive to provide diverse and innovative opportunities for all students. Vale schools are known for high academic achievement, top-notch Career and Technical Education (CTE) programs, and competitive athletic teams. Vale School District is blessed with excellent educators, supportive communities, and outstanding students.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.a: Vale School District Continuous Improvement Plan
Vale School District Student Investment Account Application

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Vale School District participates in SafeOregon, which is a program created for Oregon students, parents, school staff, community members and law enforcement officers to report and respond to student safety threats. Reports can be made using a variety of methods. Visit www.safeoregon.com to learn more.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

em.strong: The vision of the Vale School District is to prepare students in a progressive educational system.
The mission of the Vale School District is to support and empower students and staff through education.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.a: Vale School District Public Complaints Policy - KL
Vale School District Public Complaints Procedure Administrative Regulation - KL-AR(1)
Division 22 Standards for Public Elementary and Secondary Schools 2018-19 Assurances: Report to the Community

div.div: " jsaction="rcuQ6b:WYd;">

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: The Vale School District is committed to making its electronic and information technologies accessible to individuals with disabilities by meeting or exceeding the World Wide Web Consortium's (W3C's) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 Level AA and Web Accessibility Initiative Accessible Rich Internet Applications Suite (WAI-ARIA) 1.0 for web content. We are currently in the process of upgrading our website to meet/exceed web accessibility standards. If you need assistance accessing content, please call 541-473-0201.
Vale School District | 403 E. Street West | Vale, Oregon 97918
